website_summaries.verdict: Good size covers that are easy to use and constructed so that they are difficult to steal. These might not be as durable as other options, however.
pros: Large 13-inch by 15-inch covers that fit most cars, SUVs, and minivans, as well as some trucks
close them in the door or window as an antitheft measure
cons: Some reports that these do not fit some truck mirrors, and only work on horizontal mirrors

customer_reviews.title: No Quite what I Thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought the advertisement suggested that they were insulated against the cold but it is just bags that have a gathering string. They work to protect the mirror but the bag can freeze because it is very thin. Time will tell if it is sturdy enough not to rip or tear.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Dana

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected, nice ice/snow bags.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a little different use then they are intended. I have a pair of woodpeckers that decided they needed to sit on my mirrors, poop and peck at them. These were the perfect solution to send the birds packing. I will also use these in the snow. They fit my 2016 F150 mirrors perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Decker

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine was irregular?
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to put over my the chrome mirrors on my 4x4 pick-up because I had a bird who was pecking at the chrome (and depositing his "waste" all over my mirrors). I measured my mirrors and theoretically these should have fit. They didn't fit - my covers were smaller than the stated dimensions in the description - and they would not stretch to the stated size. The covers are highly rated by others. So either my covers were irregular, the stated size in the description is wrong, or there are multiple sizes and I received a smaller version by mistake? Luckily Amazon has a great return policy and I utilized it.
customer_reviews.author: CWOBOSN4

customer_reviews.title: A Work In Progress From A Satisfied Client
customer_reviews.text: The IceKing I ordered did not fit my 2017 Nissan Titan XD Pickup truck side view mirrors. However, I was able to use on another one of my vehicles. They fit nicely. In retrospect, I knew before ordering that this could be a possibility and planned accordingly. Subsequent communication with seller, indicates that he would place a future order that would include a larger size that could fit my truck. To that end I provided appropriate photographs depicting the sideview mirrors of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a very affordable price. I live in MN where it Is well below freezing for months at a time. I also work construction and tow a trailer every day. I can not drive until my mirrors are frost free and scraping them every morning has always been a pain. After scraping them i need to readjust them... this product is a game changer for me. Just put them on in the eve, take them of in the morning, no frost!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on a Friday and got them on Sunday! Wow, what a pleasant surprise and just in time too as it snowed that night. Lol. The covers themselves are rather simple, but then all they need to do is keep snow off the mirrors. The sliding adjustment for the draw string is a nice feature. All in all, a good product at a decent price and ultra fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael1957MN

customer_reviews.title: Mirror covers you need. If you vehicle sits outside.
customer_reviews.text: Used on Toyota Tacoma. I received my order quickly. I like the size; they fit. Easy to install and remove. I recommend the mirror mits to any who needs frost-free rear view mirrors. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: No More Icey Side Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These covers work great. We live in Denver so we deal with temps going from above freezing to below in a short period of time. With these conditions the side mirrors can get a thick layer of ice that's really hard to get off. With these covers that's not an issue anymore. The strings are designed so that once they are on the mirror and you want to take them off, you just pull them off the side mirror, shake them off, and toss them in the car. Saves time when you've got to clean up the rest of your car!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hart

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors were clear in the morning
customer_reviews.text: They fit the mirrors and prevented frost from forming in the mirrors I just had to remove them and I was ready to go. We finally got snow they worked great kept all snow off mirrors and no frost appeared
customer_reviews.author: desi

customer_reviews.title: Just a plain drawstring bag
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a regular drawstring bag. Not at all what I expected. Requesting return.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, as described, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed to keep the birds from pooping on my side mirrors! They kept trying to give kisses to themselves in the mirrors, and my doors suffered from poop streams. It was also great that it came so fast! It's hard to know from the descriptions of items whether they are from china (very long shipping), or the USA (quick shipping). I wish more companies would put that tidbit in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: They are "huge"
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to take the chance of having a cover that was too small for my 2015 Chevy Sonic mirrors, so I ordered this item. They are, in reality, too large for the side mirrors; but that's okay - better to be a little too large than too small. I won't get to actually use them until we get another snow; but the product itself seems to be a good one, so I consider it a wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase this because of ice and snow. I live in Alabama and am having trouble with birds crapping all over my mirrors. I turned the covers inside out to get the reflective side out as a deterrent. You need to make a cover to go over rear wipers like on my wife's Ford Explorer where they also land and crap. The covers and a small rubber snake seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Tommce

customer_reviews.title: Bird Poop No More!!
customer_reviews.text: These side mirror covers are great. I was having problems with a little bird fighting with itself in my side mirrors. The mess was secondary to my concern for it's safety. I tried using plastic shopping bags, they blew off during a wind storm...sorry neighbors. These fit both of my vehicles nice and secure. One SUV and one car. I did a little loop knot after I secured them to the mirrors with the slide. Great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: LDean

customer_reviews.title: They work amazingly well with birds!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to prevent birds from making a mess of my vehicles - put them on first thing in the morning and watched birds immediately fly over to my truck to look at themselves in the mirrors. Within 15 seconds they flew away and did not come back! Love these things!!! Super easy to put on and take off - fit perfectly on my F-150 as well as my Mazda CX-5. GREAT deal for these. You will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schiltz

customer_reviews.title: Clean truck
customer_reviews.text: My husband just got a new truck. Our resident male cardinal bird likes to fight himself in the truck mirrors but he also poops down the side of the truck because he literally fights himself all day long. Now he can't see himself and the truck stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Barely Fits
customer_reviews.text: These mirror covers barely fit over my outside mirrors on a 2016 Ford Lariat. The size is good, but getting them on is very difficult. The openings are not large enough to easily slide over the mirrors. Don't know if i will be able to get them on when it is cold.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I hoped it would do. Cardinals were getting on our vehicles, pecking at their reflections and pooping all over the doors. Put these on and no more bird poop which I hope means no more cardinals pecking at the mirroes
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea.. Mirror Mittens
customer_reviews.text: Although the weather had not reached the season peak for the mirror gloves its what I expected. Easy on and hopefully easy off when tjr 8ce storms of Oklahoma hit. Thank you for your concern and i will keep in touch. Mts. Netta Brown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only works on horizontal mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: It only works on mirrors that are horizontal. Mine are vertical with two arms, so the drawstring doesn't work at all. Wish I knew that. I'm using them anyway just hope they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Got this product because im moving up to MT and want to use them for next winter. Does not look like the picture (no logo on both sides but i dont really care) and is way bigger than i thought. No insulation just a regulat bag. Will see how they stand up in the real winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Robles

customer_reviews.title: Mirror covers work great and are easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband’s Ford F- 250 which he uses to plow snow. It has to set outside because we don’t have a garage for it. These covers arrived just in time for a huge snow and ice storm. They were so easy to put on and secure and did a great job keeping the mirrors snow and ice free. He popped them off and was good to go along with the windshield cover I also got him. Very pleased. Don’t see a down side.
customer_reviews.author: EAB

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully work
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to try them as so far the car has been in garage. Anything that would cover side mirrors from ice would work. Looks easy enough to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Plahn

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Covers
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where the sun can be brutal on vehicle paint jobs. These covers will help solve the paint fading problem for me. I am glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Frost off Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Just received, have had one morning when was frosty, but mirrors were clean and dry. Easy to put on and take off and store, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worse than trying to scrape mirrors!! Especially when you have the large convex add ons. Easy to install with the attached draw string. I only wish they would fit my K3500 pickup mirrors. Until then, I'll continue to use the plastic store bags.
customer_reviews.author: Chicklet

customer_reviews.title: Thief proof
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these yet, because I haven’t needed to, but I did put them on mirrors to see how easy and they will be perfect if and hen necessary to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large
customer_reviews.text: The outside side mirror covers are extremely large and will fit over any car side mirrors. They may also cover large truck mirrors. Purchased them to keep my side mirrors free from snow, frost and rain.
customer_reviews.author: 1Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Get them. Keeps off the ice. Pull them off before driving and you’re ready to go, as if it hadn’t really snowed or iced at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Malimichi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product - you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap pieces of plastic covering. Zi would not recommend & may donate to goodwill instead of giving to my son for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Executivemom

customer_reviews.title: Test run pending...
customer_reviews.text: It's been too warm a winter to test these out yet, but they look well made. The car is saying thank you for my mirror mittens!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Music/Theater

customer_reviews.title: It fits!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried several different windshield covers for protection from ice and snow, one look at the Ice King and I knew it would be perfect. Recently having to use it during snow storm, forgot about elastic straps to help hold in place and ripped them off. Had to replace it and this time found one that came with rearview mirror covers as well. Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the opportunity to use my windshield and mirror covers. Following a snow and ice storm, it’s such a time saving relief to just be able to remove the covers and have a clean windshield and mirrors. Can’t believe I waited so long to purchase these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forget ice
customer_reviews.text: They will definately fit and work once i'll need to use them. They do not have any markings on them, as it's different from advertising photo. They are plain black. Came early in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haydon

customer_reviews.title: No more frost!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AHHHH....these work very well. I leave early in the AM & my side mirrors were so frosty I would have to use a small scrapper. Not any more!!!! A great buy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Loy

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave two sets to my inlaws, and both say they fit their cars perfectly. They are very happy with the covers, including the mirror covers. They also make great covers to keep the bird droppings and tree sap off the cars also.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these yet but are good size and seem to be well made. I look forward to not scraping my mirrors!
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: No more scraping ice and knocking the side mirrors out of position!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good and work well with their windshield cover for a large truck. With the winter we have had so far this year, thankfully I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: We call these our mirror mittens!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have these this winter for my unheated mirrors! They fit my Toyota FJ with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Wife

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This item is big enough to slide onto your mirrors easily. It has a drawstring to close the pouch around the mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth J. Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Have used in the past and recently purchased as gifts for friends along with windshield covers. Believe they are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: A good idea for the rust belt
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a horrible winter last year. Haven't had to use them because it's been mild. And when it has smowed it's on the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ellifson

customer_reviews.title: 2016 F350 Dually mirror protector
customer_reviews.text: Very good mirror protector...i use them to protect mirrors from bird poop on my 2016 F350 Dually, they fit kind of small but I cut some on one side and make them work, I'm happy but please make them little bigger ......
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Works just as it should
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my large rear view mirrors. Closes shut easily and the cord can be safely shut inside the car so no one can take them off. I got a set for my husband as well.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Two days after they arrived, we had our first snowfall. Easy on, easy off!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tapscott

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! Poorly made and probably won’t hold to the weather
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: It is ok just fine .He needed these cause his side view isn't heated.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Nice price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: These are plenty big enough for my Nissan Rogue and work as expected. I would recommend these to everyone unless you have a double mirror. The price was great and shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Flutterby

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Great item when the ice and snow hits. Don't have to spend 10 minutes scraping off the mirrors
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These work great - fit well and stay on keeps Frost snow and ice off zero scraping completely dry side mirrors for my FJ cruiser
customer_reviews.author: DiMax

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit on my 2006 F-250 Side mirrors. Gave them to my daughter for her smaller Nissan Xterra.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: They are very thin.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at how thin these are. I am sending these back .
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Joy White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Keeps the snow and ice off my mirrors great product
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, makes things so much easier on a winter morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Item was rather easy to install, does well what it says, also got a windshield cover at the same time. The less I have to deal with winter the better! Also great customer service, sent a couple of emails to the seller, and had very quick responses from him.. highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ultralight*Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the drawstring
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine the first week I had it and then noticed in the morning that one of them had disappeared in the night presumably due to high wind. So if buying this product, make sure to doubly secure them onto the mirror since the drawstring that comes with it to tie down the cover can't be trusted.
customer_reviews.author: REZ88

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and easy to store. And they work wonders! I’m experiencing my first northern winter, as I’ve just moved up here. It’s been nerve wracking. But when I do have to park outside, I’m glad that I have these with me.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It fit so well
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that the order arrived quite on time for the first snow storm in our area. I covered my side mirrors up and it looked so good. i recommend it fo anyone who has not bought it. Now is the time. The season for snow is here. Thank.
customer_reviews.author: chukwuma izuehie

customer_reviews.title: Has other useful purposes
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where I have birds that like to perch themselves near the car mirrors and start attacking their images. This results in a big mess as you can imagine. The product worked by making it impossible for them to see their reflection,
customer_reviews.author: robert j rohmer

customer_reviews.title: No more frozen Mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fits over my truck mirrors without any issues. I will update once it snows and I am able to test them
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Great product for visors of any vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: They came in handy with this last snow & ice storm. My visors on both sides of my car were clean & not iced over.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Muller

customer_reviews.title: Large size
customer_reviews.text: Toon large for my Hyundai Tucson, but works great nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald D.

customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep on. Not suitable for windy situations. All that being said, when it worked, it worked.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Delivered quickly and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: sideview mirror covers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife but she seldom uses them
customer_reviews.author: Scott McFaulds

customer_reviews.title: Looks Better in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I thought they'd be thicker. I'm pretty confident they won't last the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using. They are what they are supposed to be/do.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This has made my life so easy for winter and there is no struggle trying to get it on or off. And my side mirrors always stay nice and clear for use.

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: Needed these to stop the cardinals from attacking my mirrors. Easy to us and worked well with the birds, but the snow too.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great product works great on my 2018 Equinox. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Covers mirrors. Looks like two small bags. So don't get confused

customer_reviews.title: Big but works very well
customer_reviews.text: They are huge. Bigger then I thought but totally worth it

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair... so happy with them I bought another pair for my sister. :)

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Fits my 2012 Ford F150 side mirrors. Keeps snow off.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great so you don’t have to try to scrape ice off your mirrors!

customer_reviews.title: I like them, pretty much what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and remove, plenty large to cover the Chevy pickup side mirrors. Only time will tell if the material will survive the extreme sunshine weather in Arkansas.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Better than a slice of bread! This is my 2nd set!
customer_reviews.author: Lhoffman02

customer_reviews.title: So happy something is available to fit and cover large trailering ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 3/4 Ton GMC with trailer extension mirrors and these fit perfectly. My only suggestion to enhance them would be to add a bit of soft insulation material to the inside of the cover. So happy something is available to fit and cover large trailering mirrors!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice to have.
customer_reviews.text: this are great to have when winter is around keep your mirrors clean and easy to put on and off of mirror.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror Cover
customer_reviews.text: We have a very aggressive Cardinal and a new vehicle. The cover has stopped the cardinal from attacking his reflection in my mirror and messing down the side of my vehicle. Great purchase. Arrived on time and would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: I love the snow/ice mirror covers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a great job. I have had mine for a year and have used them regularly. I have a Chevy Silverado and there is additional room in the mirror covers .

customer_reviews.title: Better material. Good value.

customer_reviews.text: The material is thin, but they are BIG. Easily fit my F150 mirrors.

customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I have ordered. The first pair were perfect. A five star. The second pair came with a broken string. It’s not easy to return items because of the location of the amazon store.

product_meta.title: Full Set - 2 IceKing Huge Snow and Ice Mirror Covers Universal Size Fits Cars SUV Truck Van with Advanced Anti Bird Poop Technology
product_meta.description:
Are Your Fingers Frozen and Your Car Mirrors Scratched from Scraping Away Ice and Frost?
Have you placed plastic bags over your side mirrors with disappointing results?

YOUR WORRIES ARE OVER because you have just discovered the best accessories for your car snow and ice removal.
These massive IceKing Car Side Mirror Covers will make your winter morning start for work, a breeze.

TO APPLY - just slip these covers over your car side mirrors and move up the locking slide to secure them in place. Now place the plastic knob at the end of the strings inside each car door and close. Done.SNOW AND ICE FREE MIRRORS tomorrow morning and they are totally secure from theft.

TO REMOVE - just open the door, slide the toggle down to release, slip the cover off, give it a shake and store in your glove box.
And they can be applied wearing gloves or mittens so your hands stay warm. The IceKing Side Mirror Covers are made from lightweight, durable material of the highest quality. They do not need to be a heavy fabric to work as designed.

COVER SIZE is 15 inch Long x 13 inch High. On their own or combined with the IceKing Car Windshield Snow Cover, your scraping, brushing and brooming snow, frost and ice from your car side mirrors and windshield is over, not to mention the physical effort and time wasted. Spend those extra minutes in bed or just enjoying the warmth of your home.

Order Now and wave to your neighbors left scraping and brushing away ice and snow, as you drive off with your clean ice free side mirrors and windshield.
feature_bullets: ULTRA MASSIVE SIZE No other mirror cover comes close 13 * 15 inches Will fit any car, SUV, Minivan, and even some trucks!
WIN THE HOLY WAR AGAINST BIRD ATTACKS Protects against birds attacking mirrors, damaging contact with objects in the driveway, and children with bicycles
NO MORE FROZEN FINGERS scraping ice, frost or snow from side view mirrors Just release drawstring, remove and you are ready to go - Instant visibility

EASY TO INSTALL & SAVES TIME Fast to put on and fast to take off - Just slide over exterior mirrors and adjust drawstring to close Takes seconds to remove and store easily in your glove compartment - Drive away hassle free
ANTI-THEFT DESIGN Long strings designed to lock covers inside closed car doors to prevent unauthorized removal Fits most vehicle mirrors
